name: Second Extinction
summary: Second Extinction is an intense 3 player online co-op FPS, where you work as a team to take down large groups of savage mutated dinosaurs. Fight through a maelstrom of bullets, bombs, teeth, claws and gore, it's up to you to reclaim Earth!
info:
• 别名: 二次灭绝
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Xbox Series X/S
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 3人
  • 发行日期: 2020年10月13日(Early Access)
  • 官方网站: https://www.secondextinctiongame.com/
  • 开发: Systemic Reaction
  • 发行: Systemic Reaction
